Name: VAIL VR
About the game: VAIL is a 5v5 tactical shooter game developed from the ground-up for virtual reality. Immersive Physics Guns collide with the environment. Throw magazines to teammates, bounce grenades around corners, climb ladders, vault over obstacles, ride ziplines, defy gravity on jump pads, and more. Competitive Integrity Everything in VAIL is designed to uphold competitive integrity. From standardizing player height, to preventing play space cheats; trust that every match will be competitive and fair. Social Experiences (in development) After a fast-paced match, challenge friends to mini-games in the social hub, flex gun and avatar skins, or 1v1 a friend. Customizable home, game modes and experiences in development.
Meta Title: VAIL VR: Nov 16, 2022, AEXLAB and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on VAIL VR? Check out the release date (Nov 16, 2022), developer insights from AEXLAB, and a complete game summary.
